entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: Infinity Tank Battle
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$9.99 â†’ Free [Free ~ $9.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

In-App Purchases

  • Golden Passï¼š$1.99
  • 200 Ticketsï¼š$4.99
  • 50 Ticketsï¼š$1.99
  • 500 Ticketsï¼š$9.99

Application Description

Tank Battle is very popular TV game since 8-bit console present. From 2012, we develop "Super Tank Battle" and provide 500 maps to player. Many people play it day by day. Now we using a new game engine to offer new game "Infinity Tank Battle". Infinity Tank Battle is a brand new tank battle game. It is following various classic essential features, and add some new interesting elements. Core Game Rule: - Defence your base - Destroy all enemy tanks Key Features: - Different type of enemy - Different type of Map style - Special items - Auto Helper tank - Import Super Tank Battle 500 Legend maps Infinity Tank Battle will continue update, our target is over 1000 map. And this game is cross-platform, you can find it on mobile, PC, and Mac.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Calorie Counter PRO MyNetDiary
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • MyNetDiary Premiumï¼š$69.99 â†’ $8.99 [$8.99 ~ $69.99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$3.99

In-App Purchases

  • MyNetDiary Premiumï¼š$8.99

Application Description

Track calories, food, and macros with ease! MyNetDiary has a free barcode scanner, personal diet plans, and AI Meal Scan for instant logging â€” all in a smart, simple-to-use app. USERS SAYâ€¦ The best Love this app! The best out of many food tracking apps that I have tried over the years. Love that it is free! The breakdown of the meal and daily nutrition is very informative. Try it you will love it! LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS APP Best app for tracking food, exercise! Consistently losing weight! I love how it shows you if you're on target for your goal. Great layout, great look, easy to use!!! I highly recommend this app if you're looking to be a healthier you!!! Fast, intuitive, user friendly I have tried other calorie tracking programs over the years and this app is by far the best I've come across. I highly recommend it. The free version is very good and I am now enjoying the extra functions through a paid subscription. RECOGNIZED EXCELLENCE â€¢ Ranked #1 in Forbes Healthâ€™s Best Weight Loss Apps of 2025. â€¢ Rated #1 by the American Journal of Preventive Medicine. â€¢ Praised by The New York Times as â€œsimpler, quicker, and better-lookingâ€ than other apps. â€¢ Featured in Todayâ€™s Dietitian, alongside WW and Noom. DIFFERENT FROM OTHER DIET APPS â€¢ Simple & Generous Features: Packed with free tools, no ads. â€¢ Lightning-Fast Logging: Barcode scanner and AI Meal Scan make tracking effortless. â€¢ Verified Food Database: Over 1.7 million items with 108 nutrients for accuracy. â€¢ Privacy Focused: No account required. MyNetDiary puts you in control. You can pick a diet or a meal plan, follow our registered dietitians' easy tips, and follow the app's guidance. Or, you can turn them off and simply use MyNetDiary as the best free calorie-counting app in the world. PROVEN SUCCESS â€¢ Active members lose an average of 1.4 lbs/week â€¢ Over 25 million users have chosen MyNetDiary, many switched from other diet apps A few of the free version features: â€¢ Easy food, exercise, and water tracking. â€¢ Daily coaching tips and meal reminders. â€¢ Customizable dashboard for your goals. â€¢ iOS Health integration and Apple Watch support. â€¢ Shopping lists, nutrition articles, and how-to videos. SPECIAL PRO APP FEATURES â€¢ Up to 108 nutrients tracked â€¢ Plan macros â€¢ Full set of charts â€¢ Timestamps â€¢ Carb tracking If you need more support, MyNetDiary Premium provides all the guidance and features you may need. At your fingertips, you'll find: â€¢ Premium Diets, 600+ full-flavored Premium Recipes and Menus by RDs, including low-carb, keto, high-protein, Mediterranean, vegetarian, and more - with diet planners, guides, and feedback. â€¢ Intermittent fasting - full-featured, with fasting timer and different protocols. â€¢ Macros planning and cycling. â€¢ Planning and tracking up to 108 nutrients, including omegas and aminos. â€¢ Recipe import tool - easily load internet recipes and calculate complete nutrition. â€¢ Integrations with top fitness trackers - Fitbit, Garmin, and Withings. â€¢ In-depth reporting and analysis tools to improve your diet. Subscription Terms: The subscription period will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. To turn this function off, turn off auto-renew in your iTunes account. Renewal payments will differ depending on subscription and pricing at the time of renewal. Your iTunes account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. Privacy Policy: www.mynetdiary.com/privacy.html Terms of Use: www.mynetdiary.com/terms.html

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Classic Maze Game for Watch
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$0.99 â†’ Free [Free ~ $0.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

Application Description

Classic Maze game is a classic puzzle game, perfect for training your brain during a short break. It is designed as a very simple single player game played by sliding through fun retro mazes. Play a quick game and challenge 500 mazes to become the maze king.

entry.title: PlayNav - No ads in videos!
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Premium Featuresï¼š$9.99 â†’ $0.79 [$0.49 ~ $9.99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

In-App Purchases

  • Premium Featuresï¼š$0.79

Application Description

Are you tired of interruptions caused by ads in your YouTube videos? The new YouTube PlayNav video browser will block all intrusive ads that appear while watching your videos, so you can enjoy your favorite videos smoothly and without interruptions. Plus, our app offers features youâ€™ll love: â€¢ On-Screen Playback: Watch YouTube videos while using other apps. â€¢ Audio-Only Mode: Listen to any YouTube video with your screen locked. â€¢ Auto Shutdown: Set a sleep timer. (Premium) â€¢ Loop Mode: Automatically repeat your favorite videos. â€¢ Learning Mode: Learn languages using subtitles. (Premium) It also includes essential features such as playlists, speed adjustment (improved), related videos, AirPlay, and more to enhance your video-watching experience. Â» HOW TO USE PLAYNAV? ON-SCREEN PLAYBACK (PIP) (Premium) Watch YouTube videos while using any other app. Once activated, the player will shrink on your screen, allowing you to move or hide it with a double tap. Â» How to activate it? 1. While playing a video, tap the PIP icon in the upper-left corner (two small screen icons). 2. While a video is playing, swipe up from the bottom of your iPhone, and the player will appear on your screen. AUDIO-ONLY MODE Listen to the audio of your favorite YouTube videos with your iPhone screen locked. Use it while exercising, walking, or before bed. Combine it with the auto shutdown feature to relax while listening to your favorite videos! Â» How to activate it? 1. Enable On-Screen Playback. 2. Then, lock your iPhone, and the audio will continue playing. AUTO SHUTDOWN Bedtime? Find your favorite YouTube video or playlist, set the auto shutdown timer, and let your favorite audio accompany you as you fall asleep. Â» How to activate it? 1. Tap the Sleep icon (moon) in the player. 2. Select the time you want for auto shutdown. 3. You can combine it with Audio-Only Mode. LOOP MODE (REPEAT VIDEO) Want your video to play on repeat? Use Loop Mode to replay your video as many times as you like. You can also combine it with Audio-Only Mode. Â» How to activate it? 1. Tap the Repeat icon. Your video will keep playing on loop until you disable it. LEARN LANGUAGES WITH SUBTITLES (LEARNING MODE) Now you can learn languages using subtitles! When you activate Learning Mode, you will see both the original subtitles and the translation in your language. You can also adjust the playback speed to better understand each word. Â» How to activate it? 1 Search for videos in the language you are learning. 2 Once your video starts playing, tap the Learning Mode button next to the video title. â€“ TRY PLAYNAV NOW! â€“ Enjoy all basic features for free and unlock Premium with a one-time purchase. Minimum requirements: â€¢ iOS 15 or higher. â€¢ 3G connection or higher. Â» Related keywords: YouTube, YouTube Music, YouTube Vanced, ad blocker, no subscription, skip YouTube ads, ad-free music, block pop-ups, adblock for YouTube, block pop-up ads, ad-free content, premium ad blocker, AdBlock Plus, remove ads, YouTube without ads. - Need help? Visit: playnav.vidiom.app or contact us at info@playnav.vidiom.app Terms of Service: playnav.vidiom.app/terms-of-service Privacy Policy: playnav.vidiom.app/privacy-policy

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Money Pro: Personal Finance AR
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • PLUSï¼š$19.99 â†’ $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $19.99]
  • GOLDï¼š$39.99 â†’ $9.99 [$9.99 ~ $39.99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$0.99

In-App Purchases

  • PLUSï¼š$4.99
  • GOLDï¼š$9.99

Application Description

EASY BUDGET. Cut your expenses with Money ProÂ®! Expense tracker, budget planner & account manager - all in one app to get your finances under control. Money Pro works great for personal & family expense tracking. Easy sync and iPhone/iPad versions combined in one app. Money Pro is the next generation of the Money app (over 2 million downloads worldwide). FEATURES: Simple and Secure - quick and easy expense/income entries: save your time - password & backups of your data Income and Expense Tracker - split transactions: split one payment into multiple categories, keep it all organized - search by amount, category, description, payee, cheque number, etc - recurring expenses with custom periodicity - calendar for scheduling bills and expenses for the whole year ahead - notifications & alerts for bills due - tracking expenses with family members and cross-platform syncing* (PLUS or GOLD subscription required) - multiple profiles for organized tracking of personal and family finances - attachment of receipt (or any other) photos: keep important bills captured Budget Planner - flexible structure of categories & subcategories with over 1,500 built-in icons - custom periodicity: start your budget from any date - visual indicators for budget spending - transaction list for each category: access your bills with ease - transferring the leftover of the previous budget period to the current one to limit your spending - unique icons with your photos Account Manager - easy management of an unlimited number of accounts - balance change history - additional fields for organizing your records: payee, description, check #, class (personal/business travel expenses). - import of bank statements (files: OFX, CSV) - online banking (GOLD subscription required) Insightful Analytics - eight different reports - filter customization - quick and easy date selection Augmented Reality - build three-dimensional charts right on your table with AR reports (GOLD subscription required) Goals - set your goals and achieve them - visualize your goal progress with a trend chart - four Goal types: Save money, Pay off debt, Reduce expenses, Increase income (GOLD subscription required for last three) More - calculator and currency converter - print and export to PDF, QIF, CSV formats - multiple currencies & automatic update of exchange rates - iCloud sync for iPhone, iPad, Mac (no subscription) - support service & user guide (https://money.pro/guide/) PLUS subscription - 1 Month of PLUS: $4.99 GOLD subscription - 1 Month of GOLD: $9.99 In all the countries (except the USA), actual charges will be converted to the local currency. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. Subscriptions may be managed by the user, and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Terms & Privacy - http://ibearsoft.com/privacy.html - http://ibearsoft.com/terms.html Money Pro is a Universal app. Pay once and use it on your iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch. *See App Support for further details

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Goodnotes 6: AI Notes & Docs
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Marketplace Contentï¼š$6.99 â†’ $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $10.99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

In-App Purchases

  • Goodnotes 6 (1 year)ï¼š$11.99
  • GoodNotes 5 Unlockï¼š$9.99
  • Goodnotes 6 Free Trialï¼š$0.00
  • Goodnotes 6 One-Time Paymentï¼š$28.99
  • Goodnotes 6 (1 Year)ï¼š$11.99
  • Marketplace Contentï¼š$1.99
  • Dotted Squares: Draft Papersï¼š$0.99

Application Description

Ever wish your notes could do more? With Goodnotes 6, they can! Step into the future of note-taking with Goodnotes 6, the best AI notebook for iPad. Write notes, convert handwriting to text, annotate PDFs, and use AI tools for study and productivity. Boost Professional Efficiency and Productivity â€¢ Use Ask Goodnotes to summarize, translate, and extract key insights from your notes, PDFs, and documentsâ€”perfect for your next important meeting. â€¢ Import, annotate, and organize PDFs, documents, and meeting notes. â€¢ Transcribe audio recordings from meetings so you never miss a detail. â€¢ Present like a pro, with a built-in laser pointer that is perfect for meetings and presentations. â€¢ Export and share notes via email, print, PDF, or images for easy collaboration. â€¢ Send files directly to your unique Goodnotes email for quick access on all devices. â€¢ New pen gestures like Scribble to Erase let you erase by scribbling, while Circle to Select helps you quickly select and edit notesâ€”all without switching tools. â€¢ Convert handwriting to text for quick and clean professional notes. â€¢ Sync your notes across all devices with cloud sync through iCloud, Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox, and WebDAV. Powerful Digital Notes and Study Tools â€¢ Use AI-powered study tools help you learn faster and retain more information. â€¢ Use Ask Goodnotes to generate practice quizzes, summarize text, or answer questions, directly from your handwriting. â€¢ Powered by our in-house AI technology, Math Assist, converts handwriting to text on iPad and solves handwritten equations instantly. â€¢ Convert equations to LaTeX format for easy use in reports and presentations. â€¢ Memorize vocabulary and key concepts with AI-powered Study Sets using active recall and spaced repetition. â€¢ No more flipping through pages: Handwriting search makes all your notes instantly searchable, even handwritten ones. â€¢ Collaborate in real time with classmates by working on the same document for group projects and study sessions â€¢ Record audio with live transcription while taking notes, so you never miss a detail. Easily edit, search, and remove text from the transcript to review key points faster. Enhance Creative Digital Planning â€¢ Design fully customizable notebooks, templates, and covers to fit your style. â€¢ Mix handwriting, text, stickers, images, and drawings in a single notebook. â€¢ Stay focused with Smart Timer, and boost your productivity. â€¢ Browse the in-app Marketplace for stickers, washi tape patterns, as well as stylish templates, educational materials, and planners. â€¢ Organize your notes with unlimited folders and advanced search. â€¢ Get exclusive monthly downloads every month with a paid subscription. â€¢ Use creative tools like pencil, tape, lasso tool, layering, eyedropper, and image cropping to make your planner truly yours. Experience the best AI note app for students, professionals, and planners. Join millions of users who have transformed their workflow with Goodnotes 6, the best note-taking app for iPad. Download Goodnotes 6 for free and create your first notebook today. Website: www.goodnotes.com X: @goodnotesapp Instagram: @goodnotes.app Pinterest: @goodnotesapp TikTok: @goodnotesapp Privacy policy: https://www.goodnotes.com/privacy-policy Terms and Conditions: https://www.goodnotes.com/terms-and-conditions
